scripts.db:reset: prisma migrate reset --force && npm run db:seed
scripts.redis:ping: node -e "import('./dist/infrastructure/redis/redis.client.js').then(async m=>{await m.connectRedis(); const r=await m.pingRedis(); console.log('PING ->', r); await m.disconnectRedis();}).catch(e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1);})"
scripts.redis:smoke: node -e "import('./dist/infrastructure/redis/redis.client.js').then(async m=>{await m.connectRedis(); const cKey='conv:demo:+393491234567'; await m.redis.set(cKey, JSON.stringify({flow:'IDLE',context:{},updatedAt:new Date().toISOString()}),{EX:5}); const got=await m.redis.get(cKey); console.log('GET conv ->', got); await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,6000)); const after=await m.redis.get(cKey); console.log('AFTER EXPIRE ->', after); await m.disconnectRedis();}).catch(e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1);})"
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run format:check
